程序包 org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.mongo

Auto-configuration for MongoDB.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    MongoClientSettingsBuilderCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be implemented by beans wishing to customize the com.mongodb.async.client.MongoClientSettings via a MongoClientSettings.Builder whilst retaining default auto-configuration.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    MongoAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for Mongo.
    MongoClientFactory
    A factory for a blocking MongoClient that applies MongoProperties.
    MongoProperties
    Configuration properties for Mongo.
    MongoReactiveAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for Reactive Mongo.
    ReactiveMongoClientFactory
    A factory for a reactive MongoClient that applies MongoProperties.

程序包org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.mongo的说明

Auto-configuration for MongoDB.
